trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli wishes to replenish the travel agency's supply of fiend repellent.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_TODO_00<tab>Use the extractors to harvest nectar from fragrant flowers near Xodune.
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fragrant nectar to Yubli.

TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_000<tab>As part of our ongoing efforts to ward off fiends from the area, we've been using a powerful incense. Stocks have dwindled, however, and we'll soon need to craft a new batch.

TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_001<tab>Unfortunately, we don't have the necessary ingredients to hand. We create the incense using the nectar of a particularly fragrant flower. The only trouble is it grows in a somewhat perilous location─there aren't many we can ask to brave the trip.

TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_002<tab>But I don't imagine our special advisor will have much trouble! Here, take these extractors. Using them, you should be able to harvest the nectar without harming the foliage. Head for Xodune─the plant is known to bloom in the surrounding area.
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_010<tab>Welcome back. Were you able to harvest sufficient nectar?
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_020<tab>I recognize that scent! Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_021<tab>It was the Hanuhanu who shared the repellent recipe with us. Apparently, it's especially effective at warding off fiends native to Kozama'uka.

TEXT_BANPEL113_05211_YUBLI_000_022<tab>Thanks to that powerful scent, fiend encounters are down, and customer satisfaction is up! It's also alleviated some of the burden placed on our guides-turned-protectors. Anyway, we soon get through the stuff, so I'll let you know the next time our stocks need replenishing!
